      • UniversalBucket

        public UniversalBucket(Properties properties,
                       int capacity,
                       @Nonnull
                       ItemStack empty,
                       boolean nbtSensitive)
        Parameters:
        capacity - Capacity of the container
        empty - Item used for filling with the bucket event and returned when emptied
        nbtSensitive - Whether the empty item is NBT sensitive (usually true if empty and full are the same items)
